component.name: airspy
component.summary: Control of Airspy HF+ radio receiver

description.p: Tiny and efficient software defined radio receiver - utilities Airspy is a Radio receiver that can receive between 24 MHz and 1750 MHz. Airspy has a 10 MHz bandwidth. 12bit ADC @ 20 MSPS (80dB SFDR, 64dB SNR, 10.4 ENOB) It is a High Speed USB device powered by the USB bus.
